org.webcurator.core.notification
Interface InTrayManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
InTrayManagerImpl
public interface InTrayManager

The InTrayManager is responsible for managing and creating System Notifications and Tasks. The InTrayManager is also responsible for determining which users receive their Notifications via email or their in tray.

Author:
bprice

Field Summary
static java.lang.String ALL_PRIVILEGES
          This flag specifices if the List of privileges must all exist for a User to receive the Notification
static java.lang.String ONE_OR_MORE_PRIVILEGES
          This flag specifies that at least one or more privileges must exist before the User receives the Notification

static final java.lang.String ALL_PRIVILEGES
This flag specifices if the List of privileges must all exist for a User to receive the Notification

This flag specifies that at least one or more privileges must exist before the User receives the Notification

Method Detail

generateNotification

void generateNotification(java.lang.Long userOid,
                          int notificationCategory,
                          java.lang.String notificationType,
                          InTrayResource wctResource)
generates an automated Notification for a specified user based on the notificationType and the wctResource passed in. The wctResource must implement the InTrayResource Interface.

Parameters:
userOid - the Users oid to create the notification for
notificationType - the type of Notification to generate
wctResource - the WCT resource that is effected by this notification.

generateNotification

void generateNotification(java.lang.Long userOid,
                          int notificationCategory,
                          java.lang.String subject,
                          java.lang.String message)
generates a Notification for the specified User

Parameters:
userOid - the Users oid to create the notification for
subject - the Subject of the Notification
message - the detailed message of the Notification

generateNotification

void generateNotification(java.util.List privileges,
                          java.lang.String andOrFlag,
                          int notificationCategory,
                          java.lang.String subject,
                          java.lang.String message)
generates a list of Notifications in the system to users that have at least one of the privileges specified in the privilege list.

Parameters:
privileges - the List of Privileges this Notification is appropriate for
andOrFlag - the Flag to specify if the privileges suppplied are all required ALL_PRIVILEGES or just ONE_OR_MORE_PRIVILEGES
subject - the Subject of the Notification
message - the detailed message of the Notification

                          java.lang.String subject,
                          java.lang.String message)

message - the detailed message of the Notification

generateTask

void generateTask(java.lang.String privilege,
                  java.lang.String messageType,
                  InTrayResource wctResource)
generates a Task in the System for all Users within an Agnecy with a particular privilege

Parameters:
privilege - the Privilege
messageType - the type of message to create for this task
wctResource - the WCT resource that is the source of this Task.

generateUniqueTask

void generateUniqueTask(java.lang.String privilege,
                        java.lang.String messageType,
                        InTrayResource wctResource)
Create a unique task for the given privilege/messageType/resource. If any tasks already exist for the messageType and resource, then the task will not be created.

Parameters:
privilege - The permission to allocate the task to if it needs to be created.
messageType - The type of the task.
wctResource - The resource that the task relates to.

countTasks

int countTasks(java.lang.String messageType,
               InTrayResource wctResource)
Count the number of tasks of the given type, related to a particular resource.

Parameters:
messageType - The task type.
wctResource - The related resource.
Returns:
The number of tasks.

deletes a specified Notification object

notificationOid - the Oid of the Notification to delete

void setSender(java.lang.String systemSender)
The default system email address to be used if the Task or Notification is sent by the system.

Parameters:
systemSender - the system email address Notifications/Tasks get sent from

taskOid - the task oid in question
